Posts.EditableText: Here in the forum? You can't change your profile name, of course, but if you click your name at the right top of the forum, you will enter your User Control Panel where you can change your avatar

Posts.EditableText:
I don't think so without re-registering and I don't think the avatar can be edited either.

Unless...

You could create a Facebook profile and upload a pic to it that you want as your avatar then select 'sign in using facebook account'. A bit of a long winded hack but should work.
